item.title: Revisiting the layout and the Blog project
item.description: Hello dear visitor, a long time ago I had the desire to revisit the Blog layout, however, conciliate attention to my family and write are not things that could be done at the same time, because, both of them requires dedication. Well, technically speaking, the goal was to give back to the open-source community something and so the source code is hosted on GitHub. You can use it to inspire yourself by taking this project as a solid base or even as a starting point.
